title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - The source path is incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. When running the provided code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.., the issue can be observed. It's important to note that these tests have some limitations: they may return false positives due to the lack of filename checking in the harness verification of messages. Additionally, in AJDT, the filename may be omitted if it doesn't make sense to AJDT.
OB: The source path for binary files in declare warning messages is listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
EB: The source path in declare warning messages for binary files should be in the form 'app/Main.class', not 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the provided code in 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/..'.
2. Observe the source path in the declare warning messages for binary files.
